jobDescription: Do you enjoy building relationships and working in a fast paced environment where each day is different, especially in your interaction with others?  Can you makes decisions with adherence to industry guidelines and standards with a solid appreciation for how each one impacts the big picture success of the client and the growth of the firm.  Do you enjoy working with and through others? Are you an effective communicator who enjoys motivating others through a persuasive teaching style?  Independently excellent at client service, demonstrated by clients consistently seeking your advice. Enthusiastically addresses opportunities and issues with a high level of engagement and energy.  Contributes willingly to the business development of the firm. Successfully builds network and participates in marketing efforts of the firm. Meets economic goals at the individual and team levels.  6+ years of recent tax experience in public accounting with proven client service, project management, supervisory, and leadership skills. Experience with privately held middle market clients.  High level of technical knowledge in domestic tax compliance. Strong concentration in partnership taxation and consulting is preferred.  Ability to self-direct and manage multiple projects, priorities, and timelines.  Excellent written, verbal and presentation communication skills.  Licensed CPA.  MST preferred
